#Text=SB :
#Text=If he 's looking for any of those issues to be addressed by the Democrats , they 're not going to be .

#Text=And I would hope he could also see that we 've got two people on the Supreme Court now that are , we hope , pro-life votes to overturn Roe versus Wade , that he will see that pro-life legislation was passed , that taxes were cut .
#Text=And what I would also say to him is that I think we also have to see that the system is built to spend .
#Text=I hear from Republicans and Independents alike that the biggest thing they 've been upset about , if you set aside opinions on the war , has been spending .
#Text=And the system 's just built to spend .
#Text=Whether Republicans or Democrats are in control , you just constantly get that .

#Text=I 've said many times — I ’ve represented Kansas since 1995 -- I have yet to have a single constituent come in my office and say , " Hey , we 're getting too much Federal money ; would you please cut it ?

#Text= I get all the time people saying , " Look , I 'm a conservative , but we need this bridge , we need this subsidy , we need this hospital . ”

column1: #Text=And the system 's just built to spend .

#Text=That 's why you 've gotta change the system , and I 've been pushing aggressively , taking the BRAC military base closing commission process they 'll use for military bases and applying it to the rest of government .
#Text=So you 've got an actual culling process that you 're regularly requiring Congress to vote on .
#Text=Because you 've just got to change the system of its spending proclivities .
#Text=DS : When you think about dropping out of the race , what emotions do you feel ?
#Text=SB :
#Text=Well , that presumes I 'm taking that step , and what we 're --

#Text=DS : You 've discussed it , and I 'm just wondering when it 's a thought that occurs to you -- not an inevitability -- -just when you think about it as a possibility , how do you feel when you reflect upon it ?
#Text=SB :
#Text=You know , what I 've said is that if we do n't finish fourth or better in Iowa that we 'll pull out .

#Text=And I think you just -- if you look at it in that context , and I do , and this is a fabulous country , it 's a great honor to be running for President , sharing big ideas with the country , and what a great place , that a guy can grow up on a farm in Eastern Kansas and run for President of the United States .
#Text=I love a country like that .
#Text=DS : Do you feel sad when you think about possibly leaving ?
#Text=SB :
#Text=No , I feel the great honor of putting ideas out there , and we continue to do it .

#Text=We 're giving a big speech on Sunday in Boston , and we 're going to talk there about the expansion of the pro-life agenda , the need for racial reconciliation and an official apology for slavery and segregation ... . continuous talk about big ideas .
